data.name: Flow's Island
data.detailed_description:
Live like a stray in a beautiful open world

Flow's Island is a multiplayer game in which the player impersonates a stray dog, abandoned on a deserted and mysterious island, inhabited by ancient tribes. Survive on the island, exploring, hunting and completing quests for tribe members, customize your dog and improve its characteristics by defeating your kind in fantastic PvP arenas or challenging the powerful giant beasts by cooperating with your friends.


Play the Way You Like

Play Flow's Island by choosing between single player or multiplayer player without losing your character's progression.
  • Singleplayer: no one will disturb you during your adventure. Focus on daily missions and survival without any help.
  • Multiplayer: play together with strangers or create/participate in private sessions with your friends and always live new adventures, working together with your pack for survival.

PvP and PvE

To get the title of Alpha Dog you will have to fight your kind.
Go to the arenas scattered around the game world and challenge your opponents. In singleplayer your skills are tested by an increasingly aggressive artificial intelligence, in multiplayer you will challenge your friends or other players.

data.short_description: You are one of the strays created by a multinational company determined to seize the power that hides on a mysterious island. Collaborate, survive, fight for your place in the pack and discover the magical secret of the tribes living on the Flow's Island.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960 / AMD Radeon R9 280
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 or grater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960 / AMD Radeon R9 280
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

Minimum:

mac_requirements.recommended:
